title: Exam Scores | 1 of 2
question_text:
Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2016. All rights reserved.

These side-by-side stemplots represent the scores on the final exam for a statistics teacherâ€™s $1^\text{st}$ period class $(n = 29)$ on the left and $5^\text{th}$ period class $(n = 22)$ on the right. The scores are raw scores, out of a possible $100\text{ points}$.
Which of the following statements is false?

choices.text:
The mean for 5th
period is greater than the mean for 1st
period.
Both groups have the same modal class.

5
th
period's data have less variability than
1
st
period.

st
